metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13314 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions before 13.1.10, 13.2.8 and 13.3.4. GitLab Omniauth endpoint allowed a malicious user to submit content to be displayed back to the user within error messages.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
